title: Commanding Heights : Anand Panyarachun | on PBS

quotes: Thailand's prime minister from 1991-92 and again from '92-93, Anand Panyarachun was instrumental in initiating reforms in several key sectors of the Thai economy, and to this day remains committed to building democratic institutions in Thailand.
because at that time, 50 [or] 60 years ago, Thailand was still an agrarian society.
